## Classes

### <a name="profile_webserver_old"></a>`profile_webserver_old`

Configure typical webserver

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_webserver_old
```

### <a name="profile_webserver_oldfirewall"></a>`profile_webserver_old::firewall`

Configure firewall for webserver

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_webserver_old::firewall
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_webserver_old::firewall` class:

* [`campus_subnets`](#campus_subnets)
* [`limit_to_campus`](#limit_to_campus)
* [`limit_to_ncsa`](#limit_to_ncsa)
* [`ncsa_subnets`](#ncsa_subnets)

##### <a name="campus_subnets"></a>`campus_subnets`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of campus networks used to limit access from

##### <a name="limit_to_campus"></a>`limit_to_campus`

Data type: `Boolean`

Limit web access to campus networks

##### <a name="limit_to_ncsa"></a>`limit_to_ncsa`

Data type: `Boolean`

Limit web access to NCSA networks

##### <a name="ncsa_subnets"></a>`ncsa_subnets`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of NCSA networks used to limit access from

### <a name="profile_webserver_oldidentity"></a>`profile_webserver_old::identity`

#####


#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_webserver_old::identity` class:

Data type: `Array[String]`

##### 


* [`packages`](#packages)

##### <a name="directories"></a>`directories`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of directories needed for mongodb

##### <a name="packages"></a>`packages`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of packages to install for mongodb

### <a name="profile_webserver_oldoidc"></a>`profile_webserver_old::oidc`

Optional install and configure OpenID Connect module for httpd

##### 

```puppet

```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_webserver_old::oidc` class:

* [`packags`](#packags)
* [`packages`](#packages)

##### <a name="packags"></a>`packags`

List of package resources for OpenID Connect

##### <a name="packages"></a>`packages`

Data type: `Hash`



### <a name="profile_webserver_oldpackages"></a>`profile_webserver_old::packages`

Configure packages and httpd service

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_webserver_old::packages
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_webserver_old::packages` class:

* [`absent`](#absent)
* [`installed`](#installed)

##### <a name="absent"></a>`absent`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of packages to remove

##### <a name="installed"></a>`installed`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of packages to install

### <a name="profile_webserver_oldphp"></a>`profile_webserver_old::php`

Install and configure PHP

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_webserver_old::php
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_webserver_old::php` class:

* [`ini_file`](#ini_file)
* [`ini_settings`](#ini_settings)
* [`prepend_file`](#prepend_file)
* [`service`](#service)
* [`version`](#version)

##### <a name="ini_file"></a>`ini_file`

Data type: `String`

Path of default php ini file

##### <a name="ini_settings"></a>`ini_settings`

Data type: `Hash`

php.ini settings

##### <a name="prepend_file"></a>`prepend_file`

Data type: `String`

Path of default php prepend file

##### <a name="service"></a>`service`

Data type: `String`

Name of service to restart for php configs to take effect

##### <a name="version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String`

version of PHP to install
